title: SimulationResponse Schema
description: Complete simulator response structure containing execution results, events, diagnostics, and metadata

request_id.description: Unique identifier for the simulation request

error.description: Error message when status is error

events.description: Array of event strings for backward compatibility

diagnostic_events.description: Array of structured diagnostic events emitted during execution

logs.description: Array of host debug log strings

flamegraph.description: SVG content of the execution flamegraph

auth_trace.description: Authentication trace data capturing signature verification flow

budget_usage.description: Resource consumption metrics including CPU and memory usage

protocol_version.description: Optional protocol version used for the simulation

stack_trace.description: Optional WASM stack trace captured when a trap occurs

wasm_offset.description: Optional byte offset in the WASM module
